award-winning actress paid an emotional tribute to her mother , marcheline bertrand , who died in 2007 of ovarian cancer . jolie said during her acceptance speech that her mother was very supportive of her career , driving her daughter to auditions and waiting for her for hours . she was also instrumental in inspiring her daughter 's humanitarian endeavors , jolie said .  above all , she was very
